tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE traffic_info (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    road_name VARCHAR(255),
    speed_limit INTEGER,
    traffic_flow VARCHAR(50),
    congestion_level VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_locations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INTEGER,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    road_name VARCHAR,
    traffic_flow VARCHAR,
    traffic_speed INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE travel_time_predictions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_latitude DECIMAL,
    source_longitude DECIMAL,
    destination_latitude DECIMAL,
    destination_longitude DECIMAL,
    predicted_travel_time INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE route_recommendations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_latitude DECIMAL,
    source_longitude DECIMAL,
    destination_latitude DECIMAL,
    destination_longitude DECIMAL,
    recommended_route VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    selected_route VARCHAR,
    travel_distance INT,
    traffic_conditions VARCHAR
);
